p: In 2014, two patients from New Caledonia were coinfected with DENV and ZIKV ( 14). Evidence for chikungunya-â€¨dengue co-infection has also been found in Angola, Gabon, India, Madagascar, Malaysia, Myanmar, Nigeria, Saint Martin, Singapore, Sri Lanka, Tanzania, Thailand, and Yemen ( 17). In addition, a case with dengue, chikungunya, and Zika was reported in Colombia ( 18). The synergistic effects of these viral infections were observed because the patients did not require hospitalization and recovered after mild clinical courses.
